Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: This camera is so great. The portability of this camera for when im shooting for the newspaper it is so easy to pack in my bag and take this camera to the shooting spots a little on the heavy side but who cares. if the flash could be a little less bright that would be great but i just put the camera in programmer image:set to change the ex flash settings with a program i downloaded it helped a little but other than that this is the best camera i have owned yet.The zoom is huge and even using digital zoom dont pixilate all my photos too bad thanks Hasselblad.

Reviews.Title: Not for me
Reviews.Author: Neomorphus "radiolosus"
Reviews.Content: For this price you would expect it to come with a memory card, It also doesn't fit in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: Many Worlds "Joe"
Reviews.Content: I bought this and took a picture of a steak and fries to test, but when I printed out the picture and ate it, it tasted nothing like steak or fries. For $42k I expected that it would at the very least materialize food for me. False advertising if you ask me.

Reviews.Title: Sorry, but even though a pro may shoot "a ton", at least before the advent of digital it was still way less than the average "sn
Reviews.Author: Ronald Pang
Reviews.Content: Yes, lots ended in the trashcan, but with every snap costing you real money people quickly smartened up and learned what worked and what didn't. The idea that just machine gunning everything will lead to good photos is a fallacy. If you do that you never develop an eye because, hey, why bother. If it's not THIS shot then one of the 2000 others I have taken of the same flower will be good.

ProductInfo.Features:
60 Megapixel Resolution
Includes 80mm f/2.8 HC AF Lens
40.2 x 53.7mm CCD Sensor
3.0" 24-Bit Color LCD w/ 460,320 Pixels
True Focus II and Focus Confirm
16-Bit Color Definition
Hasselblad RAW 3FR File Format
Compatible with H-System Components
DAC Automated Lens Correction System
Phocus and Lightroom 4 Software Included
ProductInfo.Name: Hasselblad H5D-60 Medium Format DSLR Camera with 80mm f/2.8 HC AF Lens
